thread.title: 'Shake and Bake' test to prove Mars Rover's red planet readiness

title: 'Shake and Bake' test to prove Mars Rover's red planet readiness
text:
'Shake and Bake' test to prove Mars Rover's red planet readiness Thursday, April 26, 2018 - 02:03
The search for life on Mars has reached an important milestone with the European Space Agency's six-wheeled surface rover prototype ready for its ''shake and bake'' test, to prove its readiness for the red planet. Stuart McDill reports.
The search for life on Mars has reached an important milestone with the European Space Agency's six-wheeled surface rover prototype ready for its "shake and bake" test, to prove its readiness for the red planet. Stuart McDill reports. //reut.rs/2r14Iky
